name: A.O.D Embrara
text: If you banish an "A.O.D" card while this card is in your hand: Special Summon this card, and if you do; add 1 "A.O.D" or "Allure of Darkness" from your Deck to your hand. When this card declares an attack: banish the bottom 3 cards of your Deck. You can only use the effect of "A.O.D Embrara" once per turn.
